maintainer.name: Joel Hill
maintainer.description: this is my main/only file manager so i watch it and its website closely

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Worker is a filemanager for X-Window on UNIX. It's a clone of the filemanager "Directory Opus 4", a very famous program for Amiga-systems. The dirs and files are shown in two independent panels (similar to MidnightCommander).
